raw_text: Captain GALHENAGE RUPADEVA (Retired Commander SL Navy RSP and Old Boy of Nalanda College,​ Colombo),​ beloved husband of Sujeewa Dharmasena,​ loving father of Dr Teluka Galhenage (son) and Dr Pamoda Galhenage (Daughter),​ brother of late Rupa Perera,​ late Tissa Galhenage,​ late Galhenage Harischandra,​ late Hemamalini Ekanayake,​ brother-in-law of late Dudley Perera,​ Swarna Galhenage,​ Lakshmi Galhenage,​ late Raja Perera,​ Ranjan Dharmasena,​ Swarna Mudalige,​ late Mahesh Perera and Nelum Dharmasena,​ passed away peacefully in Parmo,​ Ohio,​ USA. His remains will be cremated at the Jardine Funeral Home Crematorium in Ohio,​ USA on Thursday July 20th 2023,​ attended by close family and friends.044744

GOMES – MIGNONNE – It is with heavy hearts and profound sadness that we announce the passing of MIGNONNE GOMES. Dearly beloved wife of Muni (Rtd. DIG of Police),​ loving mother of Ravi (ex-SriLankan Airlines) and Sandra Gomes,​ Sonali and Rumesh Ratnayake,​ cherished grandmother of Deandra and Kamila Waidyaratne,​ Sheraiah and James Medara,​ Rahil and Nadia Gomes,​ Kalisha and Reshaiah Ratnayake,​ adoring great-grandmother to Judah Medara. Her mortal remains will lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from Thursday 20th July 2023 from 10.00 a.m. onwards. Cortege leaves parlour at 2.30 p.m. on Friday,​ 21st for cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella at 3.00 p.m. (Old Crematorium). She spent a lifetime of love and devotion to all her loved ones and was the life and soul of her home. Her place can never be filled. May she rest in eternal peace with our Lord in Heaven.044761

SAMARASEKERA – MRS NELLIE – Beloved wife of late Charlie Samarasekera (Attorney-at-Law),​ beloved mother of Udithanjalie (UK),​ Dhammika (SL) and Manjula (USA),​ expired. Funeral on 20th July 2023 at Matara General Cemetery at 4.30 p.m. Cortege leaves No. 38/​1,​ Esplanade Road,​ Uyanwatta,​ Matara at 4.00 p.m.044368
